extendedInfo.description: The FREE Bible app translated into Indonesian!  With the most translations, 700+ languages including dramatized Audio! And now The JESUS Film Project too!  Over 30,000 Five-Star ratings!  READ the Bible, LISTEN to the Bible, and SEE the Bible as never before with anyone in the world.â Video! When available for a chapter, tap the âJESUS Filmâ icon to see Godâs Word come to life in 61 video segments from The JESUS Film Project.  Available in many languages with new languages added regularly.â No additional Bible downloads required.â Localized Bible versions like Arabic (Ø§ÙÙØªØ§Ø¨ Ø§ÙÙÙØ¯Ø³.is), Chinese (èç¶.is), French, Spanish (Biblia.is), Dutch, Portuguese, Russian and more...â Share any Bible verse via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email, or Copy in just a tap.â Daily Bible programs. Bible in a Year, Proverb a Day, and New Testament in 40 Days make Scripture engagement easy.â Bookmark, highlight, and add notes. Youâre one tap away from simple, robust personal Bible study tools.â Stay in sync. With a free Bible.is Account, sync bookmarks, highlights, and notes between Bible.is Online (www.bible.is) and your other devices.LANGUAGESHere are a 'few' of the Bibles available (full list: www.bible.is/languages)  Arabic, AshÃ¡ninka, Bafut, Bulgarian, Cebuano, Chinese Mandarin, Chinese, Cantonese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Ewe, Finnish, French, German,Guaymi, Haitian, Huasteco Veracruz, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Malagasy, Mezquital, Ngiemboon, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, ...many more!MINISTRYâ Bible.is, a ministry of Faith Comes By Hearing (FCBH) a 501c(3) non-profit ministry dedicated to reaching the worldâs poor and illiterate with the Word of God in Audio. All US donations are fully tax deductible.JOIN USJoin our growing international community on www.Facebook.com/Bibleis.Follow on www.twitter.com/Bibleis.Share ideas and concerns at http://support.bible.is.

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: If your bookmark, have \"title\" & we can search the title of the bookmark, i will give you 5 stars. Because until now i still don\'t find any Alkitab apps, that have \'title\' for the bookmarks & we can \'search\' the title of the bookmark.
reviews.author: Alex Surya Rahardjo

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Untuk melengkapi sound, tentunya dibutuhkan seorang NativeSpeaker. Sangat rindu mendengar FT dlm bahasa Toraja. Kira2 apa kendala?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very amazing....wonderful
reviews.comment: Saya da banyak download aplikasi alkitab krn berbeda2 bahasa    AKHIRNYA kutemukan yang kucari 1 Tuk semua   apalagi jika da lelah membaca, tinggal dengar aja juga boleh   pokoknya VERY BEST    tapi mudah2an  ada REVISI tuk BAHASA BATAK TOBA    GBU
reviews.author: Juliyanti Pakpahan

reviews.title: Bogus!
reviews.comment: Menurut  saya  app  ini  sdh  bagus , hanya saja  sering  Kali prrogramnya Stop sendiri . Moron diperbaiki. Tq Gbu
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The feature I need
reviews.comment: The best fearure for Bible study I need and user friendly. No need to learn too much to operate it. Keep up a good work
reviews.author: Dennis Djohan

reviews.title: Download!!
reviews.comment: Iman timbul dari pendengaran, pendengaran akan Firman Tuhan..  Must download!! Klo mau tidur setel aja jg makin enak tdr na, g mimpi buruk, g mikir utang n masalah, tp tdr dlm hadirat Tuhan =D In the present of Jehovah trouble vanish & hearts are mended, in the present of the Lord
reviews.author: Claudia Kalebia

reviews.title: Audio perjanjian lama
reviews.comment: Trimakasih team bible.is...great job! Tp maaf cm bntang 4 krn audio alkitabnya cm kitab perjanjian baru...senang sekali jk ada jg dlm kitab perjanjian lama...trus maju! Jesus Christ bless us! :)
reviews.author: Javanisse Rosec

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: It has a lot of feature!! Movies, sounds, etc... what important is.. it has easy user interface.. now when i lazy to read bible, at least i can hear it by single tap.. convenient!
reviews.author: Andy Pratama

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Ini yg selama ini saya cari...dgn alkitab inI saya lbh mengerti....Alkitab ini sungguh luar biasa ! Saya sungguh berterima kasih pada team Bible Is.Tuhan memberkati
reviews.author: Lilis Lim

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: It really help me hearing the Word of God
reviews.author: DJuanda Setiawan

reviews.title: Samsung Note 2 LTE
reviews.comment: Tremendous job. Kreatif. Thanks a lot . God bless !!!

reviews.comment: Great app!!! Sgt diberkati.. filmKisah Yesus mjd pengajaran yg mudah diingat.. Jdi lbh suka baca-dengar-n nonton Alkitab dibanding main games!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ringo
reviews.comment: Dahulu saya tidak tertarik membaca alkitab... Dan kini saya siap untuk selalu membaca dan melakukan yang terbaik...  Thanks lord... I love u..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Near perfect
reviews.comment: It will be a perfect application if perjanjian lama is included in 2001 Today\'s malay version to make the reading complete. Pls update.

reviews.title: Great & helpful
reviews.comment: Really useful appication, even my children are excited to see the movie

reviews.title: Good aplication
reviews.comment: Sangat memberkati. Thank you. God Bless  buat deleveloper nya yach.
reviews.author: Devi Indriati

reviews.title: Great and handy Bible application...
reviews.comment: Praise the LORD. It is a great Bible application.  This app also provides multi languages in text from various ethnicities,  even reading sounds for many languages are included. Once it is downloaded, it can be used offline.  Thank you developer...
reviews.author: rutacs W

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Aplikasi Alkitab plg keren untuk android.. Ada link ke Jesus movies untuk PL.. Ada audiobook untuk PB.. Keren bgt!!
reviews.author: Stella JC

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Aplikasi yg sangat bagus dan fitur yg cukup lengkap shg kita dpt selalu dekat dg firman Tuhan
reviews.author: Sesarius Bimo Wijayanto

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is surely a blessing for you guys who develop this program . Putting your effort in it. God bless you all and keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Nickson Don
